bibl.title: Cleopatra: Beyond the Myth. Translated by David LORTON.
bibl.note: Éd. originale: Cléopâtre, au-delà du mythe = Curriculum (Paris, 1998).
bibl.seg: CHAUVEAU Michel, Cleopatra: Beyond the Myth. Translated by David LORTON.
Ithaca, New York, Cornell University Press, 2002, 8°, 128 pp., 2 cartes, 10 figg. ISBN 0-8014-3867-5. $22.50.
Éd. originale: Cléopâtre, au-delà du mythe = Curriculum (Paris, 1998).

C.R. par Prudence Jones, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2002/2002-05-26.html >. - Dominic Montserrat, Egyptian Archaeology 21 (2002) pp. 42-43, 1 fig. coul. - Foy Scalf, JNES 69 (2010) pp. 108-109 [concerne aussi: Prudence J. JONES, Cleopatra. A Sourcebook (Oklahoma, OK, 2006)].
